author: Universal Pictures
description:
After five days of explosive drama, the Meyer family finally achieves their "Christmas miracle."

Buy/Rent Almost Christmas Now!

Oh, the joy of family. A new comedy from writer/director David E. Talbert (Baggage Claim) and producer Will Packer (Ride along, Think Like a Man series), Almost Christmas tells the festive story of a beloved patriarch who asks his family for one gift this holiday season: to get along. title: Almost Christmas | The Family's Final Christmas Miracle
